data.title: Carmine Giovinazzo Height
data.meta_description: Carmine Giovinazzo height is 5ft 8 Â½  or 174 cm tall. Discover more Celebrity Heights and Vote on how tall you think any Celebrity is!
data.text:
Andrew M said on 27/Jan/16

He looks shorter than this, shorter than his co-star Gary Sinise who is said to be 5' 8". His very slight build won't help.

doodlebug said on 2/Jul/13

He seems shorter on TV.....

Gabriella said on 15/Apr/09

I think he's 5'9'' because he's got an inch on the 5'8'' Hill Harper.

S.W.M. said on 24/Mar/09

I thougth he was my height but he's just a lil bit tall im 5ft 5.5(160.62) but it's all good i'm only 14

Lmeister said on 4/Feb/09

Actually he looks at least an inch shorter than Gary Sinise. I think he is 5ft8ish. Click Here

Monica said on 27/Sep/08

I expected him to be a little taller because on tv he seems taller than most of his costars on CSI: NY. Much shorter in person.
